The body count is in....the numbers are being checked and varified by our independent adjudicators.

todays dead....

xsilverchairx - Killed in action - 4th october 2005...god rest his soul.

a bomb today exploded in xsilverchairx's livejournal user info page...killing most of the people in the friends list area of the region. It fatally wounded xsilverchairx no posts were found. Rumours that xsilverchairx still live are false...and no he is not  at the beach with elvis. MYBADISGRAMMAR will pick up the pieces. check your user info to see if you are one of "the few" that survived this ordeal...get on with your lives.

Funeral details...rumour has it that Rohypnol & coke? are playing a 4min set for the family and friends for this loss.

"manz this ale is called 'manns'...like, for real"
"mybadisgrammar"
famous last words.

To all reading...goodnight. Time to make a change...a fresh...a clean slate...and most of all move on.

i opened up like a gapeing wound, bled everywhere. Theres blood on the canvas, this blood will stain. i fear the sun will set, i waited painfully for the re-birth, the dawn of the sun. The sun is up but the moon is down, without the light of the sun, the moon can not shite white, nor is it visible to the human eye. give space, but do not loose orbit, for the sun is the energy of all that lives, the light that blinds.
(L) ♥ this band so much!! fucking awesome.

Yesterday me and lewis decided to go to London to see Strapping Young Lad at the Astoria. Decided driving down would be best as there is pretty much no way home from london after a gig. So planned the journey with the aid of some internet map thing that turned out to be aload of bollox. ended up getting lost in london for a while. at one stage we thought we was gonna miss the show and was thinking of just heading home...but we made it. The show was intense, a great set.  Had a right laugh, my bro tagged along too cos he was bored. hes into punk music so the gig pretty much ruined his life.hahahah.Beecher supported...they were incredible. anyways here s the pics.

 

Beecher^

anything from Thongs, Beer, Bras and even a porn mag was thrown on stage....Dev' made full use of all of it ^

Aliens vs. Devin Townsend

Finally... my Internet works again. SORTED!

I missed it good...sad but so true. hahaha.

Not been up to much really. Had a "quiet" weekend at berkshore. few people came round, was good to see them. Had a bbq on the park also in the day. Got hella wasted and watched some dvds and talked and talked for hours. i love my friends...i really do.

Oldy has now got a proper nice guitar and an even better amp to play it through, sounds lush. Him and Lewis have been jamming lots recently. I was there today almost got a song together, im really excited even though i have had little input so far. We have limits at the moment, but ideas flow like a river when we put our heads together, it seems like we are thinking the same things, in it for the same reasons, same taste in music etc. i dont care if we ever get a couple more guys to get a full band, just hanging out writing music is so good.

Saw Lauren on sunday, that was cool, hadnt seen her for like 2 weeks, she is hella busy with her exams and stuff at the mo' shes gonna do dead good no doubt. was nice just to hang out and talk all night, be stupid, do stupid stuff, sing along to the most RANDOM music videos. had a great laugh.

Things Jonny currently loves: friends, berkshore, Internet(hahah geeeek), listening to two close buds write some proper amazing stuff, BBQs, That summer feeling you get, Awesome sunsets as darkness falls at work, The dissociatives(and finding out that they are playin in the UK), Eighteen Visions, Caliban, Thrice, Thrice's new DVD/CD bundle thing, the line up for download fest, Plans for this summer.

Things Jonny currently hates: being "subtly" dissed on and being made out to be someone who im not, haveing to work bankholiday monday when most of ur mates are having fun, The fact that its light and the birds are singing as i get home from work, the fact that i still work nights, the rate at which i spend money, songs ive heard too much of recently,

 

"Im due for a miracle, 

Im waiting for a sign,

I'll stare straight into the sun,

And i won't close my eyes."
Just had my hair cut and dyed. i think it turned out ok.. got it nice and cheap cos my mate did it, which was hella cool. Took ages to do it tho.

So...yesterday me, Oldy and Lewis planned to go out and about and take some snaps. We didnt have any ideas of where to go, but en route to picking up oldy me and lewis noticed the five cooling towers of a power station. See them everytime i go to oldys and think....that would be good to take pictures of. So we went to oldys and he mentioned it also and we decided to go down and get as close as possible to take some pictures.....We got there and confirmed our theory that it was abandoned and not in use. So, we decided to break in to get some wicked pictures.

It was so sureal being in there. you could tell the place hadnt been in use for decades. The odd piece of litter told us that we wasnt the only people to break in recently. To get in we parked the car at the main gate where there was lots of warning signs telling us that it was "patroled by security" and under 24 hour cctv surveilence. Turns out there was no security and only one camera which was pointing at my car as it happens. we walked round the metal fence and then into a farmers field in which we randomly heard BAG-PIPES...crazy farmer.....there was some wire fencing which had come down so we just climed through that. The land was really open, only the 5 cooling towers remian. There was some piles of rubble further away which could have been offices and the rest of the power station. In the distance we could see masses of pilons and electrical jumble, i think they were still active, we could hear humming comming from them. We actually discoved it was possible to get inside the cooling towers too, that was amazing. just looking up inside, your voice echoed for so long.  So much for the security...pfft. we finnished taking pics and walked back to the car and drove home, never with confrontation.suckers.

The cooling towers from the A50^(and Jonny Bravo)

So its Valentines ♥ day monday...boooo. The day you are either EXTREAMLY HAPPY or if like me you are single are at the very opposite end of the spectrum. Valentines day can eat a dick. Im not sending and i dont hope to recive. best way. Its just another day "This day is for Lovers".

SATURDAY!
What a blast. Went to lewis for a bit of a change from city. Was QUALITY. got hella drunk, we watched an awesome film and then later had a porn fest. Hahahahah was funny as. Everyone was taking the piss alot, was hella funny. good night, cheers to lewis and people that went. x
What the fook is everyone doing today and Tonight? I dunno what to do. I dont wanna waste a day off doing naff all. help x

Well what an Eventfull weekend. Been a crap one, it really has. for many reasons really. It went too fast....way to fast. I cant belive i have to go back to work allready. feels like i only just got away for a break..2 days felt like 2 hours.

                                                                     ---------------------------------------------------------

Its time to let go of that hope, i know its gone now, gutted, </3, dissapointed...I thought this time things would go ok for me, i thought i had found what i had been looking for, perfection almost. I knew from the start i guess. i thought i would make it through, but the line has been cut and im drifting...sinking.

City as usual it was on sat night, was so nice to see just about everyone out. :0) Jenna, Lauren, Nici, Laura, Bekki, Oldy, Lewis,Loren, Blissy, Scatt, Lee, Kay, Partay Platts...and the one and only Mr JT aka Josh, fucking LEG-END. I wanna say sorry if i forgot someone and i want to say thank you to those who know who they are for talking to me and setting my head straight.

Sunday- today..Did nothing really, lots of thinking to my self. I had such a wicked time at band practice. It was great. Oldy came along too, was cool, think he was digging our cover of Warning, cos he asked us to do it again. Everyone was full of energy even after the night before getting fooked. Was great!! and then,Plattsey....Pulled out this new song....Sexy bastard!!! really is sounding great sounds kinda hell is for heroes/Reuben.. ish Absolutly adore it. cant wait to get all the lyrics sorted so we can start getting some gigs. i cant wait till tuesday till the next practice. that will be awesome as fuck.

Now who is grabbing lees ass? Blissy? Loren?? hahaha.

Jt

...no comment

Oldy lookin' chain

THEE Lauren fbf4f

Also last week i Taxed and Insured my new car, which is amazing and i proper loves it.
anyone going to rock shitty tonight and want to be taxi buddies to make it cheaper, long eaton innit or any where not far. sorted

Wahooo pay day, little less than i expected but wahoo none the less.

Weekend>>> was amazing on saturday <33 everyone seemed to Generaly have a good time bar a few bad things but generaly cool as. I had an awesome night thanks to someone who is AMAZINGly (ha ha you see what i did there??) awake at this hour txting me!!! what whhaaaaaat!? nutta. hahaha as if i work with your (bling $ bling) brother, how weird is that!!! 
Had a lazy day sunday as allways...me and oldy woke up nuff early and did nothing...then he went home.....thats about all that happend sunday.ZZzzz

Work is ok i guess. i love the job, the people there and the money its just the hours, so im currently job hunting for a decent day job, still at the airport maybe..gonna look at the job centre today and see whats on offer. oh yus how can i forget; My new car is now parked on my drive awaiting tax und insurance which im getting at the end of the month. Hell YUS!!!

Today= haircut maybe, jobhunting, and trying to fit a cd player in my car(task and a half).

rest of the week= fuck knows except Thursday=starbucks avec LLLLL L-unit!!!! YUS! <3

as they would say in a bridgend south wales kebab shop at 1am "turrah brah" :)

Im SICK of this routine, i need a change. I dont want a day job...I NEED a day job, nights is proper doing my head in. But where else can i work? idealy i want the same job same hours just 12 hours earlyer ie 9am-4pm rather than 9pm-4am harsh as. I feel like im a Robot, all i do is work, i cant do anything else in the week. FUCK THIS SHIT. After chrimbo/new years thats it KA-PlOW im out of there, i know Blissy is feeling the same, so at least its not just me. If anyone knows of a cool place to work in the day let me know. That would be awesome. cool as fuck. ha these make me giggle.

Does anyone Hactually have plans for New years eve yet? :S

Hell yes, im going to see Silverstein, Underoath, hurt process twice in just over a week at the end of Januray/beggining of February. so awesome. Laurens buying me a ticket for my birthday and im getting her a ticket for the derby show for Chrimbo, awesome as fuck (thanks innit <33333333 xxx). sunday seemed like such of a waste of a day, we drove hours in the middle of no where it got dark quick...we got there turned around and came home...but it was nice to get out and go for a ride. There was the most beautiful sky at sun set. i took a couple of pics but was in the car speeding along so they are'nt fantastic. I might be changing my contract at work to a 4 on 4 off thingy which i think will suit me and its more money!!! wahey! Chrimbo soon...not that i get any time off.harsh as. Boring......

Fuck knows whats going on now, was gonna go to uni in sept, thats not happening now, supose il just work some more get rent a flat and chill out for a bit then sort something out career wise. we shall see...

I need some new albums, im getting tired of the ones i have. Anyone got any recomendations?

I also need a DAY job.....any recomendations?

Blah. Allthough, ive started listening to my silverchair stuff lots more recently. hell yes. whats everyone up to at the weekend, i think im hitting rock shitty. Yourcodenameis:Milo are playing and they are pretty cool.

im wide awake now im at home, how ironic when im so tired and sleepy at work. gay fest. xxxxxxx

Well thats it, monday allready. The weekend flew right by, it sucks how times flys when your having fun. Saturday started off shit, me and oldy were nackered and wishing we hadnt agreed to go out and meet a guy from work, but the night ended up being proper bo. A 6pack of redbull and 2 litres of vodka and coke soon sorted us out and made us hella glad we came out. Started off in Rescue rooms where we saw Laura, Laura, and nici sat on the comfy chairs so we joined them for  a chat. That was probably my favorite part of the weekend, chilled out as fuck music full of people sat talking to everyone for ages and that unspoken feeling of that atmosphere about a place full of people on a night out. Ahhhmazin. After a bit those dudes had to dash to we went to speak easy after meeting up with Scatt and plattsey....blissy didnt make it hahaha bless. speak easy was ok, allthough the pool table was out of action. doh. They closed early i think, or did i loose track of time. hmm. City was all good. Nothing special, music was good for a bit. Was awesome to see Nat hate not seeing her as much anymore. awesome. here comes another jam packed fun week of work!!! YES I CANT WAIT....honest *rolls eyes*.

Its pay day...FINALLY....but i got a cheque again cos they lost my bank details for a third time. By the way this is supose to be the leading logistics company in europe, how can a company ship boxes across the world over night but loose an employee's bank details sent on internal mail and direct to their pay office 3 TIMES. thats reDICKulous. im pissed off thats another week i have to wait for my money, BASTARDS. sorry for the moan but im proper pissed off. xxx

words cant describe the weekend i've just had....had lots of good points, the firework fest2 was great, hanging round lewis's after was....lifechanging....i think i was clinicly insane for a good 4 hours. i laughed, i cried, i was scared, i was so happy, talk a bout a pic n mix of emotions. I also realised a few things, some major things. Words cant describe my feelings on that topic...i shouldnt be this way, not at all.Nice guys finnish last.its true.

BLAH BLAH FUCKING BLAH!

Last saturday was well good. All the boyos got suited up and hit nottingham. Went lewis's house first for some pre night out drinks. was battered b4 i left the house to be honest, seeing as we made a mad punch with free alco-pops and vodka. After that we headed into notts for the meal at Scruffy's. the food was ace. Plattsey made me laugh, he was the only one not eating cos he was on "a liquid diet" meaning he went to the bar and kained more shots and beer than most of us managed over the course of the night. What a guy!!!

After the meal we hit up Rock Shitty, got so many dodgy looks as we wandered around pimp'd/g star'd up. Was a laugh tho.

No pics tho cos FUCKING Photobucket have decided to put a 20mb limit on accounts and u have to pay for accounts or more space now....gay fest.....

Plans:The Sat comming up....tomorrow...

City loving as usual. might hit the cinema b4 with the boyos to see Alien vs Predator. SAFE. That will be nice. Get a day off chill and have a jam with the band...then shits going down.

Sunday night.....FIREWORK FEST.

Gonna get some boyos and gurlos and cruise out to the countyside for a few brews and take a load of fireworks and have our own lil show.....will be ace. shall take my camera for that. hell yes. its also halloween so we might have to drive by some chavs and egg the fuck out of them....he he he. who's up for it???

 

:P xxxxxxxx

Last night was fun. Went down to Notts with the boyz. Firstly hit rescue rooms for the happy hour then went to scream for lee's girlfriends party. was then gonna go to city but i ended up so fucking drunk i had to throw in the towel and go 'ome. lets just say scream's toilet saw what i had to eat that day. i was on the white telephone to RALPH. shit. it was due to a mix of way to much to drink to fast and me being nackered after going to work at 6am that day. Should have paced my self. ah well. i had fun and didnt feel too ill, i just didnt want to wreck ne ones night so i went home alone which is all good cos it was self inflicted...anyways...picatures..i also added a couple to the leaving ball post i did a few posts back. it starts.. that was in rescue rooms. then we went out side. mandown the usual suspects (can i) SCREAM heh me and sam getting EMO in the toilets that must have been moments b4 Ralph fest :( lol

Then i had work. which wasnt that bad actually. ma buddy Paul was on (Parnold) and hes funy as fuck so had a reet laugh. he was telling me how he randomly signed a photo and put it on ebay. crazy fool >>>check it

Today

Ive done Fuck all so far. Been up about 2 hours. Meeting Nat soon tho' should be cool, not sure what we are going to do but im sure we'll find something to do. She's going to city later i havent got the cash cos im going on saturday...scratch that shes just txt me saying shes covering a shift at work...balls. ah well ill see her soon. ok now ive got two choices......I can:

  1. Go to work and do an extra shift
  2. Go down blockbuster and rent a few dvds and a ps2 game or something....hmmm.

I know most wil advise the 2nd choice but im thinking i really need to work more. i know ill see what oldy wants to do. if he wants to come round then ill do choice 2. if not ill hit work.

In other news....the family situation has calmed down. I think its all good now. Also the band is doing great at the moment. The songs sounds seriously amazing...lee is doing supoybe on Bass. We all really cant wait to bust out some more gigs and hit the sudio. its gonna kick ass when we do.

peace

xxx

yesterday was awsome. checked in to the hotel at like 2ish then we went swimming and hit the gym and sauna. was really cool. then we started drinking and i had like a bar in my room. had shit loads to drink i got compleatly wrecked, then i got all g'ed up and stuff. went and met of peeps who was arriving. it was cool to see so everyone looking so awsome. anyways after more drinking we had the meal which wasnt too bad. that was closely followed by awards and mess around awards etc. i got a nomination for the lowest trousers award???? didnt htink i wore them low at all really...oldy won that hands down.lol hehehe ASS MASTER. then the D-I-S-C-O kicked in...but the dj sucked balls proper hehehe DJcocksmoker. lol. by this point i was paraletic almost. i had to stop drinking for a bit to ensure my upright standingness while awake. didnt want no man down. i took a few pics which ill try to get up soon, but im sure xxxoldyxxx will beat me to that so there no point. the bar closed at like 1:45 which was pretty awsome, i started just feeling tired and like shit, and ria was by now flirting with one of my mates which sucks, alot. especially after what went on only an hour b4 i saw her flirting with him...bitch. i know she is gonan post a comment back...probably making me look wrong as usual. botherd. I had a few EMOtional goodbyes to a few mates...Harris and Holly in particular. even tho harris isnt moving away..silly boy. But Holly is going to leeds, which sucks, ill go visit her tho. Then i went to my room and went to bed, i had a massive bed it was so comfortable. well better than my piece of broken ass thing they call a bed. had a good night sleep. wasnt too hung over this morn. had a breakfast at the hotel then checked out and went home. lol but we just went out for lunch at weatherspoons. crazy. well....here i am...again...its 03:38 at the moment...i have to stop this. I need to change a few things really...
First of all i need to sleep properly because it cant be good on my mind with all this shitty lets not sleep much business.
secondly, i need to cut down on the getting drunk...i have done and im still working on it. last time i drank was michelles party last sat. thats 4 nights in a row without booze...thats good for me, infact no wait i had one can of fosters last night at scatts...lol dammit...see..i fail.but me and oldy have  a pact at the moment...neither of us are hitting city for a whole month..we are half way...this saturday will be saturday 2 without city. or thursday for that matter....need to save money rather than blowing it on getting out my face...i sound like an old man... im 18 i shouldnt care...but i do...i looked at my last bank statement and the fact that i spent 220 quid just on getting fucked up royally is really bad. i dont spend any of my money (which i really do have to slave at to get) on stuff i can show for my money..like CDs i want or clothes etc. so im gonna actually do this and buy some stuff...rather than blowing it as i normally do...then after the month is up, when i hit city...it will be awsome cos ill get bladded for low amounts of cash and it will all be good rahter than routine... i know if anyone is reading this they will be bored...im kinda venting stuff at the mo and sorting stuff out in my head.Thats why no one comments. i read other peoples and they got shit loads a comments...its cos i rant too much and no one has any thing to say because there just isnt.
I really want Billy Talents Album...and i want Reubens album...they are awsome live....Oldy asked me today if i had any Thursday albums i could lend him...and i paused for a second and realised that i dont actually have any...that sucks Thursday are like one of my favourite bands...all i have is a few MP3s... i need full colapse and war all the time...lol make me think of dotty skag heads spending every penny they can find on their next fix... i seem to just no buy anything except alcohol. I couldnt even afford to buy one of my best mates a present for her 18th...its gotta be late...i suck so bad at presents...ill get her one...:( i dont speak to Nat much no more...not since the end of 6th form...she seems to either hang with kelly or with her boyfriend...hes cool..which is weird, nat normally goes out with proper nob 'eds who treat her like shit...hah made me think..i blew it a year ago this saturday...fool.ah well.lol made us proper awsome friends cos of it. i love her to bits... thats another thing i need to change..im gonan make the effort to see her more...she lives quite close.

hmmmmm...what else.......im single at the mo' thats all good tho' i dont mind at all, ive been through ALOT of shit cos of the O-+ Gurls...I dont need no shit.
